availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John M. McMahan (Green County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Green County, Kentucky, farmer. Green County, Kentucky, native. Married to Nancy Martin McMahan. Father of Mary E. McMahan, John F. McMahan, Martha J. McMahan, Alexander McMahan, Henry McMahan, and Judy M. McMahan. Married to Harriet Coffee McMahan in Green County, Kentucky, on April 12, 1858. Father of Nancy C. McMahan, Margaret McMahan, and Malinda S. McMahan. Farmer in Green County in 1850. Farmer in Green County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, District 1, p. 111B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, District 2, pp. 557-8.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, Precinct 2, p. 447A.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994036, Green County Births.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994036, Green County Marriages.
